title: VERBATIM: Latest Syria attack could amount to 'war crimes' -U.N.
text:
VERBATIM: Latest Syria attack could amount to 'war crimes' -U.N. 12:10pm EST - 00:54 
A bloody and deadly week of attacks in rebel-held areas in Syria, in some of the worst violence of the seven-year conflict, could amount to 'war crimes,' a United Nations Human Rights Agency spokeswoman told Reuters. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A bloody and deadly week of attacks in rebel-held areas in Syria, in some of the worst violence of the seven-year conflict, could amount to 'war crimes,' a United Nations Human Rights Agency spokeswoman told Reuters.
